title: Instructional Design Scenario for Reorganization of Nurse Orientation Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Case analysis and application of a redesigned nurse orientation program based on psychiatric hospital case studies

learning_goals: Build a core competency model for a nursing orientation program according to rational instructional design principles
Design efficient training strategies to minimize employee turnover in organizational downsizing scenarios
Write an educational effectiveness analysis report through project-based assessment in a mobile microlearning environment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
